Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, running north and south from this point.
Room.LongDescription: Oceanview Drive runs straight through the administrative section of town. At this point, the City Guard Barracks lie to the east and the Oceancrest Detention and Rehabilitation Center lies to the west. Entrances to both centers are located on Rosecrest Street, which lies to the north. Ocean- view continues to the north and south, heading towards Nylanden Bay and the commercial districts, respectively.
